channel.title: magento-2 on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in magento-2 on Stock2Shop

item.title: Magento 2.x
item.description: Attribute Sets Sync your Product data to specific attributes on Magento 2. The attribute data will be sent from Stock2Shop based on the data that has come from your ERP. Create Simple and Configurable Products Stock2Shop can create Products on your Magento 2 Store as either Simple products with no options or configurable products with variations. Manage and control Categories Stock2Shop can control the Magento 2 categories as well as the hierarchy.
